TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMobileWebFormServices

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: Define uma interface para um componente do designer de página obter serviços de um host de designer, como Visual Studio 2005 em tempo de design.

span.span: Defines an interface for a page designer component to obtain services from a designer host such as Visual Studio 2005 at design time.

summary.span: Para saber mais sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, veja Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (Aplicativos móveis e sites com ASP.NET).

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Todos os métodos nessa interface devem ser implementadas pelo host de design e disponibilizado para os componentes do designer por meio deste interface.All methods in this interface are to be implemented by the design host and made available to designer components through this interface. Antes de tentar usar os métodos em um componente de designer personalizado, verifique se que o host de design, na verdade, implementa a interface.Before attempting to use the methods in a custom designer component, verify that the design host actually implements the interface.

public: void ClearUndoStack();
abstract member ClearUndoStack : unit -> unit

summary.span: Limpa todos os itens no cache **Desfazer** do host de designer em tempo de design.

span.span: Clears all items in the designer host's **Undo** cache at design time.
This API is obsolete.

summary.span: Para saber mais sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, veja Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (Aplicativos móveis e sites com ASP.NET).

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Uma vez que o método é implementado pelo host de designer, verifique se ele existe antes de invocá-lo.Since the method is implemented by the designer host, verify that it exists before invoking it.

param.name: controlID

param.span: A chave para o item de cache.

summary.span: Obtém um item do cache do host de designer em tempo de design.

span.span: Gets an item from the cache of the designer host at design time.
This API is obsolete.

Public Sub UpdateRenderingRecursive (rootControl As Control)

abstract member UpdateRenderingRecursive : System.Web.UI.Control -> unit

param.name: rootControl
param.span: O controle de contêiner com o qual iniciar a atualização.

span.span: The container control with which to begin the update.

summary.span: Atualiza recursivamente o controle associado e cada um de seus controles filho no host de design em tempo de design.

span.span: Recursively updates the associated control and each of its child controls in the design host at design time.
This API is obsolete.
